name: Pyxai
headline: An assessment tool that evaluates people to predict future success
description: Pyxai helps organizations evaluate, identify and source top talent by focusing on the best indicators of long-term job success, soft skills. Our proprietary, AI driven assessment tool helps organizations increase retention by at least 30% all while reducing the time to hire by more than 50%.

founders.name: Angela Edwards, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and an avid student of life. Always in beta.
Years working on proving the values of soft skills and culture values for the workplace. Hustling everyday to create the first unicorn focused on soft skills and culture.
Super excited about data, human behavior, and I/O psychology.
Enjoy reading, running, sci-fi movies, graphic design, cooking, baking, and painting.

# Measuring Human Potential

## Don’t hire for hard skills then fire for lack of soft skills!
##### Turnovers costs companies a combined $1 trillion dollars annually!
Employee turnovers: 
Decreases productivity
Increases workplace toxicity
Negatively impacts culture
Decreases institutional knowledge
Negatively impacts customers
## Pyxai identifies the success skills of the future
##### We assess for skills that determine long-term job success in a job role.
Predict candidate's future outcomes before hiring.
Pyxai uses job simulations and videos to assess.
![Empowering organizational development](https://www.pyxai.com/files/images/pyxai-data.png?v3.012)
#####  Rich data & analytics to make informed hiring decisions. 
[Get this for your team](https://www.pyxai.com/</request/sign-up>)
## Recruitment Problems - Resolved!
![Empowering organizational development](https://www.pyxai.com/files/images/266f4942746720351c93d9ac729939e4.jpg?v3.012)
![Empowering organizational development](https://www.pyxai.com/files/images/07571e51b933e171247f924e2b20ee5d.jpg?v3.012)
![Empowering organizational development](https://www.pyxai.com/files/images/adba65ee88b10323365f4c0541add79d.jpg?v3.012)
### Want to finally fix your retention problems?
We'll boost your new hire retention by up to 30%. Better fit candidates are proven to stay longer!
### Not enough time to recruit?
Slash your time to hire by up to 50%. Use Pyxai for 1-st round interviewing or phone screening of all candidates at scale.
### Looking for a fair and equitable way to screen all talent?
All job applicants are screened across the same set of criteria. Find hidden talent with less biases.
### Want to identify skills that don't show up on a resume?
Identify the intangible skills or soft skills that don't show up on a resume but are important predictors of success.
[Learn how we can help](https://www.pyxai.com/</request/sign-up>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pyxai**

Founded in 2019 and proudly part of Y Combinator's Batch W19, Pyxai is a Boston-based startup with a mission that packs a punch: to enhance the hiring process by assessing soft skills, which are often the best indicators of long-term job success. With its team of just five, Pyxai has set its sights on a compelling problem—the mismatch in hiring that leads to costly employee turnover, estimated at around $1 trillion annually. 

At its core, Pyxai offers an AI-driven assessment tool that significantly boosts employee retention (by at least 30%) and slashes the time to hire by more than 50%. By focusing on soft skills through job simulations and video assessments, Pyxai makes hiring decisions smarter and reduces bias. This means organizations can not only hire faster but also hire better.

**Key Offerings and Impact**
- **For Employers:** Pyxai equips organizations with tools to evaluate, identify, and source top talent efficiently.
- **For Job Seekers:** It helps candidates showcase the soft skills that are crucial for success, even if they aren’t visible on a resume.
- **Impressive Metrics:** Companies using Pyxai have seen at least 30% more high-performing hires and a 20% reduction in recruiting costs.

**Unique Selling Proposition**
Pyxai stands out by tackling the recruitment challenges head-on: it not only assesses for hard skills but prioritizes soft skills—those intangible qualities that can be pivotal for employee success but often go unnoticed. This dual focus changes the hiring narrative, aiming for better fits and longevity in roles.

With a growing footprint in the SaaS and B2B sectors, and endorsed by groups like their partner Nan, Pyxai is poised to reshape how organizations think about talent acquisition and employee retention. Their website serves as a hub of information for both employers and job seekers, making the process of finding and securing talent smoother and more effective.

In a nutshell, Pyxai is all about measuring human potential and creating a more equitable path to employment. If you're looking to modernize your recruitment strategies, this might just be the tool you need. Check them out at [pyxai.com](https://www.pyxai.com).
